name: Backup Solar Generator
tag_list: backup-power, backup-solar, home-backup, backup-battery-system, backup-power-system, backup-generator-power
overview:
Supplying backup solar power systems for homes and mobile use.

Backup generators can be incredibly useful, but most backup generators cannot start themselves automatically. With most types of generators, you would have to manually start the generator, and you may even experience a power surge when the generator is activated.

Solar generators are different. Solar backup generators are activated automatically whenever there is a power outage. There is no power surge, and power flows with practically no interruption. They are also a clean, quiet energy source, unlike their gas-driven counterparts.

One source for affordable backup solar power systems is BackupSolarGenerator.com. They sell a complete solar backup system at less than half the cost of other solar generators.
